context.description: Project mapping, code search, file reading, and git status

repo-context.description: Repository context server with project_map, code_search, read_files

repo-qa.description: QA server for build_health, test_runner, navigation_audit

e2e-test-generator.description: Generate Playwright E2E tests from natural language descriptions

interdomestik-qa.description: Local project QA tools including Database Query and Stripe Access (Custom)

postgres.description: Query and manage the local Supabase PostgreSQL database (Official)

stripe.description: Interact with Stripe API (Official) - Requires Valid STRIPE_SECRET_KEY in args or env
